content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position 0,0 to 2,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) - Processing iron ore with coal fuel
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) - Processing iron ore with coal fuel

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position 4,4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore with coal fuel

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position 6.5-12.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5 to -2.5, 22.5-28.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with coal management
- Ensure sufficient coal is harvested before attempting to insert into machines
- Check coal inventory before attempting to refuel machines

### Errors with lab placement and interaction
- Cannot place lab at already occupied positions
- Ensure proper lab entity reference when trying to access lab
- Verify lab position coordinates before attempting operations

### Variable reference errors
- Use correct variable names when referencing furnaces (furnace1, furnace2, furnace3 instead of furn)
- Double check variable names match the defined entities

### Entity placement conflicts
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Verify entity dimensions and required space before placement attempts
